81069.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their
roots in order to achieve even greater heights. When you reincarnate, your level will return to 1 and your skills will be
reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've reincarnated, you'll be able to use weapons
and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

81070.「<%sM_monster>を\n レベル転生させますか？\n<se_nots:

<break>

81080.「他に 聞きたいことはありますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モン:

<select_se_off>

81081.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

81082.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The more you fight with your fellow monsters, the more you bond with them. When you reach 100, they'll fight with you even if you're
not a magic user or armor user... Also, when your Familiarity Level reaches 200, you can gain new Skill Points...

81083.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 着けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make a dress-up item, you'll need
special materials from your monsters... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose a monster
to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their materials...
You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you can change it at will. You can use the "Dress Up
Goods" command to dress up your monsters. There's also a new service called "Dress Up Color" that lets you change the appearance of
your fellow monsters... If you have a "dress- up color ticket", you can change the look of your monster to your liking...

81084.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

81085.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:

<select_se_off>

About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up

81086.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

your monsters to your monster farm... You can see the monsters you've sent to your Monster Farm in the "Monster Farm" section of the
Adventurer's Outing Tool... You can learn more about this service by clicking "Ask Me..." Oh, and if you're looking for a
Scout's Book, it's available at the tool shop next door... So...

88340.「ここは 旅人たちの仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場です。\n<br>\:

96557.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their
roots in order to achieve even greater heights. When you reincarnate, your level will return to 1 and your skills will be
reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've reincarnated, you'll be able to use weapons
and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

96558.「お連れの <%sM_otomo>を\n レベル転生させますか？\n<se_no:

By reincarnating and starting from scratch, <%sM_otomo> will awaken a new power and can climb to even greater heights!

96564.「はじめてのレベル転生なので\n 追加スキルをひとつ 覚えられます。\n 新しい:

choose the one you'd like.
<break>

monster tavern before... I apologize for the inconvenience, but we'd like to speak with the manager of the Monster Tavern... I'm sure

partner and most important fellow monster... I'd like to know more about them before I take care of them... The Monster Tavern is
located in the basement of the town's tavern...

96573.「他に 聞きたいことはありますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モン:
Is there anything else you'd like to ask me?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters

About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

96574.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

96575.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

96576.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

96577.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

96578.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

96579.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

96580.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

111590.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their

reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've reincarnated, you'll be able to use weapons
and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

111608.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

111609.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

111610.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

111611.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

111612.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting

111613.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

111614.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:

monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

111777.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

111778.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

111779.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

111780.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

111781.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

111782.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

111783.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

111946.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

111947.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

111948.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

111949.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

111951.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

112097.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their
roots in order to achieve even greater heights. When you reincarnate, your level will return to 1 and your skills will be
reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've reincarnated, you'll be able to use weapons
and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

112113.「仲間モンスターの世話すりゃ いいんだな。\n<br>\n「ん？ お前は まだ\:
You're supposed to be taking care of your monsters... Hmm? You've never been to a monster tavern before... While we're lounging
around here, let's talk to the demon keeper at the monster tavern... He's a weirdo who knows a lot about his fellow monsters, so
he's got a lot of information to share... He's your partner, so you should know what you're getting into before you come to me.
The monster tavern is in the basement of the tavern in town.

112114.「他に 聞きたいことはありますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モン:
Is there anything else you'd like to ask me?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

112115.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

112116.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

112117.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

112118.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

112119.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

112120.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

112121.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

112266.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their
roots in order to achieve even greater heights. When you reincarnate, your level will return to 1 and your skills will be
reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've reincarnated, you'll be able to use weapons
and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

112284.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

112285.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

112286.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

112287.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

112288.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

112289.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

112290.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

112435.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:

112453.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

112454.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

112455.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

112456.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

112457.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

112458.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

112459.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

112987.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:

and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

113005.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

113006.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The "Happiness" of your fellow monsters will increase as you fight together, indicating the depth of your bond.
Monsters whose Happiness has reached 100 will fight with you even if you are not a Monster Master or Item Master.
They can also earn new skill points when their Happiness reaches 200.

113007.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 付けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make these items, you'll need
special materials that your monsters give you... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose
a monster to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their
materials... You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at
will.

113008.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy the Scout Book at the nearby tool shop... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack...
However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring
it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with
your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in
mind...

113009.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

113010.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

113011.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

137759.「すくすく育っているようですね。\n 今後も モンスター牧場をご活用ください。\:

137777.<pipipi_on>\n「おおっ！ それは <%sM_item>ですね！\n:

<%sM_item> can be used to create dress up accessories for your monsters, so please feel free to use them!

137779.「それと <%sM_monster>の 転生を祝して\n お客様の仲間モンスター:
And to celebrate this momentous occasion of <%sM_monster>'s reincarnation, we'll reward those who invited them to a Monster Farm party!
The 30 most recent people who invited them to a party will receive a special gift. I'll show you a list of who will be rewarded.

137780.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their
roots in order to achieve even greater heights. When you reincarnate, your level will return to 1 and your skills will be
reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've reincarnated, you'll be able to use weapons
and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

137781.「<%sM_monster>を\n レベル転生させますか？\n<se_nots:
Do you want to reincarnate
<%sM_monster>?
<se_nots System 0><break>

137782.「おおっ！\n <%sM_seikaku>な たたずまいの中に\n 道を極めた者:
Ohh! A monster with the <%sM_seikaku> nature that definitely mastered its own path...
By reincarnating and starting from scratch, <%sM_monster> will awaken a new power and can climb to even greater heights!

137796.「旅人たちの 仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場へ ようこそ！\n<br>:
Welcome to the Monster Tavern, the place where adventurers and their fellow monsters gather!
...Oh! Is this your first time visiting a Monster Tavern?
In that case, you'll need to speak with a Monster Manager inside of a Monster Tavern first.
They're quite knowledgeable about fellow monsters, and will be able to share with you some very helpful information.
Fellow monsters are very important to us, so we want to make sure you're knowledgeable enough to take proper care of them.
You can find them in any Monster Tavern, which is in the tavern's basement in most towns.

137797.「他に 聞きたいことはありますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モン:
Is there anything else you'd like to ask me?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

137798.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

137799.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The more you fight with your fellow monsters, the more you bond with them. When you reach 100, they'll fight with you even if you're
not a magic user or armor user... Also, when your Familiarity Level reaches 200, you can gain new Skill Points...

137800.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 着けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make a dress-up item, you'll need
special materials from your monsters... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose a monster
to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their materials...
You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you can change it at will. You can use the "Dress Up
Goods" command to dress up your monsters. There's also a new service called "Dress Up Color" that lets you change the appearance of
your fellow monsters... If you have a "dress- up color ticket", you can change the look of your monster to your liking...

137801.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... You can
buy it at the tool shop next to the Monster Tavern in the basement... Once you've read the Scout Book, you can go to the monster's
location and perform a Scout Attack... However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle. If you've successfully
scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able
to meet new monsters by defeating them with your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the "Friend Monster
List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in mind...

137802.「何について 説明しますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モンスター:
What would you like to talk about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

137803.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

137804.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

137806.「『部屋いれかえ』は 名前のとおり\n 仲間モンスターが 預けられている部屋を\:
As the name suggests, "Room Swap" allows you to swap the rooms where your fellow monsters are kept. By switching rooms, you can change
the order of the rooms to suit your needs... You can also rearrange the rooms by moving them to an available additional room when you
use the "Storage Space Expansion"... For more information about additional rooms, please refer to the "Additional Rooms" section...

216516.「<pc>さまに お知らせです。\n お預かりできる 仲間モンスターさまが\n:
I'm sorry to inform you... We've increased the number of companion monsters you can keep by 4! If you're both a magic user and a dodge
user, you can now keep up to 24 companion monsters with you... If you don't have enough room, we have additional rooms available...
Please check the Monster Tavern for details... We've also added a new "Room Swap" feature to the Monster Tavern! As the name
suggests, this function allows you to switch the rooms of your fellow monsters in the Monster Tavern. If you want to change the
order of your monsters, or move them to a different room, please use this function...

216878.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their
roots in order to achieve even greater heights. When you reincarnate, your level will return to 1 and your skills will be
reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've leveled, your fellow monsters will be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of their equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by repeatedly level
reincarnating your monsters, so you can make them even more unique... If you're passionate enough to reincarnate, this game will surely
meet your expectations...

Monster Tavern is located in the basement of the town's tavern...

216918.「他に 聞きたいことはございますか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モ:

216920.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that a magician or a magician's companion joins are called "companion monsters"... A companion monster is different
from a support companion. I will remain your companion forever... And... The experience you gain in battle will help you level up... and if you spend enough
skill points... you'll learn special moves. And more. You can equip your own equipment! As with support companions, you can't give detailed orders, but you can gain experience whether
you're in or out of combat, so it's always a good idea to bring along... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but
you can only have one companion, so we'll take care of the others...

216922.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n <pc>さまとの絆の深さを示す\:
Fellow monsters, when you fight with them A monster's "natsukido" level, which indicates the depth of your bond with it, will increase. Once you've reached 100,
monsters will fight with you even if you're not a magic user or armor user. Also, when your Familiarity Level reaches 200, you can
gain new Skill Points...

216924.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 着けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to create a dress-up item, you'll
need special materials from your fellow monsters... If you have a house, you can place a garden tool called a "Monster House" and choose a monster to spend time with. You can pet the
monsters in your house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their materials. You'll also need to create a dress-up item to
wear it, but once you've created one, you'll be able to change it at will. You can find the dress-up items by using the "Dress-up
Items" command on the "Monsters" screen... There's also a new service called "Dress Up Color" that lets you change the appearance of
your fellow monsters... If you have an item called a "dress-up color ticket", you can change the look of your fellow monsters to
your liking...

216926.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy the Scout Book that matches your profession and read it... You
can buy it at the tool shop next to the Monster Tavern in the basement... Once you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's
location and perform a Scout Attack... However, you can only perform one Scout Attack per battle... If you've successfully
scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring it into your group after the battle. Even if the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able
to find a great encounter by defeating many monsters with your Scout Attack... The monsters you can scout can be found in the
"Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in mind...

216928.「何について ご説明しましょうか？\n<select_se_off>\n仲間モン:
What would you like me to tell you about?
<select_se_off>
About fellow monsters
About Scouting
About the degree of familiarity
About Monster Farm
About Level Reincarnation
About dressing up
About room change
About additional rooms
<select_end><break>

216930.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the monster farm A portion of the experience you've gained in battle will be automatically... You can send up to three of your favorite companion monsters, regardless of your occupation or level of familiarity! This also
applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't send companion monsters that are with you... Also,
if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience. You can also visit the monster farm from the
"Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team members and the monsters your friends have
sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30
party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just let me know... And... When one of your monsters is reincarnated, you can thank them for inviting you to their party... I can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gifts for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

216932.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

216936.「『部屋いれかえ』は 名前のとおり\n 仲間モンスターが 預けられている部屋を\:
As the name suggests, "Room Swap" allows you to swap the rooms where your fellow monsters are kept... By switching the room You can change the order of the rooms to suit your needs... If you are using the "Expansion of Storage Space", you can move to an
available additional room to organize your room... For more information about additional rooms, please refer to the "Additional Rooms"
section...

287895.「旅人たちの 仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場へ ようこそ！\n<br>:
Welcome to the Monster Tavern, where travelers and their monsters gather! This is where we keep and manage our scouted
monsters. You can choose which monsters to take with you, check on their condition, and even make them dress up... You can also send
your monsters to your monster farm... You can see the monsters you've sent to your Monster Farm in the "Monster Farm" section of the
Adventurer's Outing Tool... You can learn more about this service by clicking "Ask Me...". So...

287896.「ここは 旅人たちの仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場です。\n<br>\:
This is the place where the travelers' friends, the monsters, gather to drink... Huh? I see you've finally become both a
magician and a potion wielder! For those of you who love monsters, we offer a service that lets you keep more of them... We've also
increased the number of monsters you can take in, so you'll be able to use the Monster Tavern more than ever... That's why...

287897.「ここは 旅人たちの仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場です。\n<br>\:
This is the place where the monsters of travelers gather... We've started a new service where you can send your fellow
monsters to the monster farm! The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of the
experience you've gained in battle... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the Monster Farm, regardless of your
profession or level of familiarity! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't send
companion monsters that are with you... Also, please note that if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more
experience... So...

287898.「ここは 旅人たちの仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場です。\n<br>\:
This is the place where the monsters of the travelers gather... You can now use the "Adventurer's Outing Super Convenience Tool"
to visit the Monster Farm! In the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team members and the monsters that your friends
have sent to your farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow monsters... I'll keep a record of
up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be
able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We
can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gifts for you, so you won't need to bring any more... Also,
the number of times she can be reborn has been increased from 5 to 6, so please take good care of her... Now...

287899.「ここは 旅人たちの仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場です。\n<br>\:
This is a monster tavern where travelers' monsters gather... We've increased the number of monsters you can keep by four... If you're
able to change your job to either a magic user or a dodge user, you can keep up to 12 monsters... If you can switch to both, you'll
be able to keep up to 20 monsters... This is a great opportunity to bring all kinds of monsters into your life... So...

287900.「ここは 旅人達の仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場です。\n 今日は ど:
This is the Monster Tavern, where adventurers
and their monster companions gather.
What can I do for you today?
<break>

287901.「どの子を 連れていきますか？\n<break>: Which monster do you want to take along?<break>

287902.「今 連れている子は 入れ替えで\n お預かりしますので\n 新しく連れていく子:
We'll be replacing your current child, so
please choose a new one to take with you...<break>

287903.「連れていくのは この子でいいですか？\n<se_nots System 0><: This is the monster you'd like to take?<se_nots System 0><break>

287904.「今は この子を連れていけないようです。\n 追加部屋の 利用券があれば\n 連:
We can't take this monster right now. If you
have an additional plan for extra space in
the tavern, then we'll be able to.
<end>

287905.「おーい！ <%sM_monster> お迎えだよ！\n<end>:
Hey! <%sM_monster>! I'm here to
pick you up!
<end>

287908.<pipipi_on>\n「他に ご用はありますか？\n<break>:
<pipipi_on>
Is there anything else I can help you with?
<break>

287909.<pipipi_off>\n<%sM_otomo>を酒場に預け\n<%sM_mo:
<pipipi_off>
<%sM_otomo> was deposited into the tavern,
and <%sM_monster> joins the party!
<me 61><end>

287910.<pipipi_off>\n<%sM_otomo>を酒場に預け\n<%sM_mo:

and <%sM_monster> joined your party
on standby!<me 61><end>

287911.「では <%sM_otomo>をお預かりして\n <%sM_monster>を:
Okay, then I will take <%sM_otomo>
and get <%sM_monster> for you.
<bw_break>

287912.「今 連れている <%sM_otomo>を\n 預けるんですね？\n<yesno: So you're leaving <%sM_otomo> with us now?<yesno><break>

287913.「わかりました！\n この子のお世話は お任せください！\n<end>: Understood! We'll take good care of them, don't worry!

287916.「おや？ 預けられるモンスターを\n 連れていないみたいですね。\n<bw_br:
Hmm? I don't think I have a monster to
deposit.<bw_break>

287917.「では 新しい名前を 教えてください。\n<end>: Now, tell me your new name...<end>

287918.「どの子の名前を 変更しますか？\n<break>: Which child's name would you like to change?<break>

287919.「今は この子の名前を 変更できないようです。\n 追加部屋の 利用券があれば\:
I can't change her name right now... If you
have a ticket for an extra room, you can
change it...<end>

287921.「……おや？ どうやら その名前は\n つけることが できないみたいです。\n:
... Hmm? I'm afraid I can't give you that
name... You'll have to give him another name.<end>

287922.「<%sM_monster> ですね。\n この名前で よろしいですか？\n<y:
<%sM_monster> ... Are you sure you want to
use this name?<yesno><break>

287923.「では今から この子は <%sM_monster>です。\n 今まで以上に かわ:
So, from now on, she's <%sM_monster... Please
take care of him better than ever!<end>

287924.「名前の変更を やめますか？\n<yesno><close>:
Do you want to stop with renaming?
<yesno><close>

287925.「レベル転生とは その道を極め レベル<%nM_maxlv>に\n 到達したモン:
Level Reincarnation is the process by which a monster who has mastered their craft and reached level <%nM_maxlv> returns to their
roots in order to achieve even greater heights. When you reincarnate, your level will return to 1 and your skills will be
reset, but you will gain bonuses to your base ability and skill points... Also, once you've reincarnated, you'll be able to use weapons
and armor regardless of your equipment level! And more! You can add up to two new skills by level reincarnation, so you can make your
monsters even more unique... If you're passionate about your child, I'm sure they'll live up to your expectations...

287926.「おおっ！\n <%sM_seikaku>な たたずまいの中に\n 道を極めた者:
Ohh! A monster with the <%sM_seikaku> nature that definitely mastered its own path...
By reincarnating and starting from scratch, <%sM_monster> will awaken a new power and can climb to even greater heights!

287927.「<%sM_monster>を\n レベル転生させますか？\n<se_nots:
Do you want to reincarnate
<%sM_monster>?
<se_nots System 0><break>

287928.「はじめてのレベル転生なので\n 追加スキルをひとつ 覚えられます。\n 新しい:
This is their first reincarnation, so they can
choose 1 additional skill line. Please
choose the one you'd like.
<break>

287929.「今回が <%nM_tenseicount>回目の レベル転生なので\n 追加ス:
This is my <%nM_tenseicount> second level rebirth, so I get to choose two additional skills... You'll have to relearn the skills
you learned last time...

287930.「では レベル転生によって与えられる\n ひとつ目のスキルを 選んでください。\:
Now then, please choose the first skill line
you would like to use.
<break>

287931.「レベル転生によって与えられる\n ふたつ目のスキルを 選んでください。\n<b:
You will choose a second skill that will be
granted to you upon level reincarnation...<break>

287932.「新しく与えられるスキルは\n <%sM_skill>です。\n レベル１からと:
The new skill you'll be given is
<%sM_skill>.
Level will also reset to 1. Is that okay?
<se_nots System 0><break>

287933.「新しく与えられるスキルは\n <%sM_skill_1>と <%sM_skil:
The new skills you'll be given are
<%sM_skill_1> and <%sM_skill_2>.
Level will also reset to 1. Is that okay?

287964.「まもの使いや どうぐ使いが\n 仲間にしたモンスターを\n 『仲間モンスター』:
Monsters that have been recruited by magic- users and armor-users are called "companion monsters"... Unlike support monsters,
companion monsters will stay with you as long as you don't say goodbye to them... In addition... You level up with experience
gained in battle, and learn tricks with skill points... And on top of that, they can equip your equipment! As with your support
companions, you can't give them detailed orders, but you'll gain experience whether you're in or out of combat, so it's always a
good idea to carry them around... You can have up to <%nM_maxcount> monsters as companions, but you can only have one
companion, so we'll take care of the others...

287965.「まもの使い どうぐ使いの職業になっても\n やみくもに モンスターを倒している:
Even if you're a monster wielder, you can't just blindly kill monsters and expect them to join you... In order to get a monster to join
you, you need to use your "Scout Attack" skill to win the monster's heart... To use the Scout Attack, you must first read the
Scout Book that has the name of the monster you wish to join... There are different types of monsters that can be taken in by Mage and
DOG wielders, so each has its own Scout Book... Be sure to buy and read the Scout Book that matches your profession... Once
you've read the Scout Book, go to the monster's location and try a Scout Attack... However, you can only perform one Scout
Attack per battle... If you've successfully scouted the monster, you'll be able to bring it into your group after the battle. Even if
the monster doesn't join you, you'll be able to meet new monsters by defeating them with your Scout Attack... The monsters you can
scout can be found in the "Friend Monster List" in the "Senreki" menu, so keep that in mind...

287966.「仲間モンスターは 一緒に戦闘をしていると\n あなたとの絆の深さを示す\n 『:
The more you fight with your fellow monsters, the more you bond with them. When you reach 100, they'll fight with you even if you're
not a magic user or armor user... Also, when your Familiarity Level reaches 200, you can gain new Skill Points...

287967.「仲間モンスターは レベル<%nM_maxlv>に達すると\n 『レベル転生』で:
When a fellow monster reaches level <%nM_maxlv>, it can be "level reincarnated"... By Level Reincarnation, your
monster's level will return to 1, but its basic abilities will increase, and its skills will grow stronger... You'll also be able to
use weapons and armor regardless of your equipment level...

287968.「仲間モンスターは 『おめかしグッズ』を\n 着けてあげることで 見た目を変えら:
You can change the appearance of your fellow monsters by giving them "dress-up items"... In order to make a dress-up item, you'll need
special materials from your monsters... If you have a house, you can put a garden tool called "Monster House" and choose a monster
to spend time with... You can pet the monsters in the house, and after a few days, the monsters will give you their materials...
You'll also need to create a dress-up item to wear it, but once you've created one, you can change it at will. You can use the "Dress Up
Goods" command to dress up your monsters. There's also a new service called "Dress Up Color" that lets you change the appearance of
your fellow monsters... If you have a "dress- up color ticket", you can change the look of your monster to your liking...

287969.「お預かりした 仲間モンスターを\n モンスター牧場に 送ることができます。\n:
You can send your monsters to the monster farm... The monsters you send to the Monster Farm will automatically receive a portion of
the experience you gain from fighting... You can send up to three of your favorite monsters to the ranch, no matter what your
profession or how well you know them! This also applies to companion monsters that are living in the monster's home, but you can't
send companion monsters that are with you... Also, if your level has reached <%nM_maxlv>, you will not receive any more experience...
You can also visit the monster farm from the "Adventurer's Outing Tool"! At the Monster Farm, you can hold a party with your team
members and the monsters your friends have sent to the farm... Partying will increase the experience and familiarity of your fellow
monsters... I'll keep a record of up to 30 party invitations, so if you'd like to see them, just ask me... And when one of your
fellow monsters reincarnates, you'll be able to thank them for inviting you to their party... You can send a thank-you gift to the
Monster Farm in the Adventurer's Guide. We can only send gifts to people who have been recorded... We'll prepare the gift for you,
so you won't need to bring anything else.

Hmm? <%sM_monster> is registered to Battle Roads, so I can't part with him right now. If you're registered as a party or support

288056.「……おや？\n お客様が来てから 仲間モンスターたちが \n ものすごく はし:

288057.<pipipi_off>\nなつき度が <%dM_natuki> にあがって\n:

<end>

288058.「ここまで育ててくれて 仲間モンスターたちも\n すごく喜んでいるみたいです！\:
You've brought me this far, and my fellow
monsters seem to be very happy! Please
continue to take good care of them...<end>

288060.「ここは 旅人たちの仲間モンスターが集う\n モンスター酒場です。\n<br>\:
This is the place where travelers' monsters gather... We've started a new service where you can send your fellow monsters to the
"Monster Farm"! You can send up to three monsters to the Monster Farm, and during this time, a portion of the experience you gain in
battle will be automatically sent to you... You can also use the "Adventurer's Outing Tool" to check the farms of your fellow
monsters, team members, and friends... And if you host a party in your farm, you can increase the experience and friendliness of
your fellow monsters... So why don't you invite your friends and team members and have a party...

288061.「さて 今回 お客様に\n 新たなサービスのご案内です！\n<br>\n「おめか:
Now, we're pleased to announce a new service for our customers! You can now change the "Dress Up Color" in the Dress Up Goods
feature! This is a great new feature that will allow you to change the appearance of your current monsters to a different color...
For example, you can change a slime to look like Slime Beth, or dress it up to look like a different type... To do this, you'll need a
dress-up color voucher, so if you have one, you can use it to change the color of your choice...

288062.「一度 作成すると 同じ種族の\n 仲間モンスターを 連れていれば \n いつで:
Once you've created one, you can change it to this color any time you have a companion monster of the same race... Do you want to
create a <%sM_color>?

288064.<pipipi_on>\n「……はい！ できました。\n ぜひ <%sM_col:

Goods" command in the "Search" command "Friend Monsters"...

288069.「お客様に とっておきのお知らせです。\n このたび お預かりできる 仲間モンス:

on, the "Room Swap" function is newly available! As the name suggests, this feature allows you to switch the rooms of your fellow
monsters. If you want to change the order of your monsters, or move them to a different room, please use this feature...
